page.title: 03Education
page.content: There are three Educational Establishments in our area:.{ {1 ST. Nicholas C.E. Primary School The primary school serving the Kingsdown and Ringwould children is at the junction of the Dover and Ringwould roads.There are 138 children in the school,52 infant and 86 junior pupils.The Head is Mr.A.Reay and the staff are: Miss Griffith,Mrs.Parry, Mr.Fletcher,Mrs.Maynard and Mr.Gates. The main building was built in 1869. All five classes are now housed in temporary or mobile buildings.A bus brings Kingdown children to school each day. A new school i expected to be completed at The Butts in Kingsdown in 1987. {2.RIPPLE DOWN HOUSE} A reidential study centre instigated by The Cleary Foundation and funded by THE i.L.E.A.Takes children from 7-18
